revised_title: The Guatemala Earthquake of April 19, 1902: A Reexamination of the Transmission Rates
tldr: The author reexamines the records of the Guatemala earthquake of April 19, 1902, to determine the true time of arrival of the first and second phases of wave motion at various stations. The study provides a more accurate understanding of the transmission rates of earthquake waves and their characteristics, contributing to the development of seismology.
